verses.roman:
vṛndāvana haite yadi prabhure kāḍiye
tabe maṅgala haya,--ei bhāla yukti haye

synonyms: vṛndāvana haite—from Vṛndāvana; yadi—if; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kāḍiye—I take away; tabe—then; maṅgala haya—there is auspiciousness; ei—this; bhāla—good; yukti—plan; haye—is.
translation: "It would be good if we could get Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu out of Vṛndāvana. That is my final conclusion."
